Note: Reference to the associated BioProject record
To be IDENTICAL, `age` MUST be age of subject at sampling time point. In contrast, MiAIRR also allows other reference time points for `age`
Value for this field MUST be `sampling` to be consistent with BioSample's `age` definition. See `age`
BioSample attributes `(super_)population_*` were not used as they encode keywords from the Coriell Institute, whose suitability for MiAIRR has not yet been fully evalutated
BioSample has separate attributes for `strain` and `breed`. MiAIRR has only one keyword (`strain_name`) for this information
BioSample attributes `family_*` were not used as they suggest a restriction to genetic relationship
BioSample attributes `family_*` were not used as they suggest a restriction to genetic relationship
BioSample attirbute `bio_material` has an overlapping meaning, however it is not required for submission
BioSample attribute `collection_date` was not used as it defines an absolute date
